name: UltraFlex Running Shorts
description: Lightweight 5-inch shorts with built-in liner and secure zippered back pocket. Moisture-wicking fabric keeps you dry and comfortable. Ideal for running, yoga, and other athletic activities. Comes in ocean blue, navy camo, and black.

name: FlexDry Yoga Tank Top
description: Breathable and stretchy tank top made from a moisture-wicking bamboo blend. Features a scoop neck and racerback design for a comfortable fit. Ideal for yoga, Pilates, and other fitness activities. Comes in white and black.

name: PowerLift Compression Leggings
description: High-waisted compression leggings with squat-proof fabric and side pockets for phone storage. Four-way stretch material provides support during weightlifting, CrossFit, and HIIT workouts. Anti-chafing flat seams ensure comfort during intense training sessions.

name: AeroMax Training Hoodie
description: Lightweight performance hoodie with thumbhole sleeves and kangaroo pocket. Made from quick-dry polyester blend that regulates temperature. Perfect for pre-workout warm-ups, outdoor training, and casual wear. Features reflective logo details for low-light visibility.

name: FlowMotion Yoga Pants
description: Ultra-soft yoga pants with wide waistband and bootcut design. Made from organic cotton and spandex blend for maximum comfort and flexibility. Perfect for yoga, meditation, and lounging. Gusseted crotch prevents tearing during deep stretches.

name: SpeedStrike Running Tights
description: Compression running tights with graduated compression zones to improve blood flow and reduce muscle fatigue. Features reflective strips, zippered calf pocket, and drawstring waist. Ideal for long-distance running, marathons, and cold-weather training.

name: CoreFlex Sports Bra
description: Medium-support sports bra with removable padding and racerback design. Moisture-wicking fabric with anti-odor technology. Wide underband provides comfortable support without digging in. Perfect for weightlifting, cycling, and moderate-impact activities.

name: ZenFlow Meditation Shorts
description: Loose-fitting shorts made from organic hemp and cotton blend. Features an elastic waistband with drawstring and side slits for unrestricted movement. Designed for yoga, meditation, and relaxation. Naturally antimicrobial and eco-friendly.

name: TurboRun Performance Shirt
description: Lightweight technical running shirt with mesh ventilation panels and flat-seam construction. UPF 50+ sun protection and reflective elements for safety. Quick-dry fabric wicks sweat efficiently. Ideal for road running, trail running, and racing.

name: FlexFit Training Shorts
description: Versatile training shorts with 7-inch inseam and four-way stretch fabric. Features multiple pockets including zippered back pocket and side phone pocket. Reinforced stress points for durability during heavy lifting and CrossFit. Quick-dry and odor-resistant.

name: CloudStep Running Shoes
description: Lightweight running shoes with responsive foam midsole and breathable mesh upper. Features heel-to-toe drop of 8mm and durable rubber outsole with traction pattern. Suitable for daily training, long runs, and road racing. Available in multiple colorways.

name: PowerGrip Workout Gloves
description: Padded workout gloves with silicone grip pattern and adjustable wrist strap. Breathable mesh backing prevents overheating. Protects hands during weightlifting, pull-ups, and CrossFit. Easy pull-off tabs for quick removal between sets.
